column2: ENGLISH
Painter
This character has a creative soul that seeks to capture the essence of creation on parchment and canvas.
column3: Ce personnage a une ame creatrice qui cherche a capturer l'essence de la creation sur parchemin et toile.

column2: Musician
This character is known as an expert among minstrels.
column3: Ce personnage est connu comme un spécialiste parmi les ménestrels.

column2: Proficient Writer
This character has spent long hours practicing the art of writing.
column3: Ce personnage a passé de longues heures à pratiquer l'art de l'écriture.

column2: Ruthless
This character is not bound by honour.
column3: Ce personnage n'est pas lié par l'honneur.

column2: Chivalrous
This character is the embodiment of chivalry.
column3: Ce personnage est l'incarnation de la chevalerie.

column2: Tall
This character is of considerable stature, taller than most of their race.
Agile
This character is nimbler and quicker than most.
column3: Ce personnage est plus rapide et habile que bien d'autres.

column2: Perceptive
This character is sharp, possessing excellent senses and intuition.
column3: Ce personnage a une excellente intuition, et on peut difficilement le duper.

column2: Melodious Voice
This character has a pleasing voice that sounds like the singing of birds, or a choir of angels.
column3: Ce personnage a une voix plaisante, qui résonne comme le chant des oiseaux.

column2: Powerful Voice
This character speaks in an imposing tone that can persuade friends, frighten enemies, and inspire subordinates.
column3: Ce personnage possède une voix imposante, qui peut persuader les amis, terrifier les ennemis, et insipirer ses sujets.

column2: Ambidextrous
This character can naturally use both hands with equal skill. As a result, they are more efficient in whatever they do, whether it is swinging swords or writing letters.
column3: Ce personnage peut utiliser ses deux mains avec autant de talent.

column2: Lefthanded
This character is better at using their left hand than their right hand. It offers them many advantages when dealing with others, but it is viewed as a bad omen by the superstitious.
column3: Ce personnage est gaucher. Cela peut lui donner maints avantages, mais il souffre du regard des autres.

column2: Wrymouth
This character was born with an oddly-shaped chin or jaw – perhaps it is too big, or too small. Hopefully, this facial feature won’t spread with interbreeding.
column3: Ce personnage est né avec un menton ou de la mâchoire à la forme étrange - peut-être qu'il est trop grand ou trop petit. Espérons que cette caractéristique du visage ne ??se propagera pas à ses descendants.

column2: Absent-Minded

This erratic character was born with a scatterbrained temperament. They tend to forget things easily, get distracted too easily, or both. This behavior may be endearing to some, but to others it is an annoyance.
column3: Ce personnage se laisse facilement distraire, et a tendance à oublier rapidement certaines choses.

column2: Deaf
This character is hard of hearing, or, worse, cannot hear at all. Such a disability limits their ability to function.
column3: Ce personnage a beaucoup de mal à entendre, peut-être même complètement. Difficile pour lui de tenir ses fonctions dans ses conditions…

column2: Lip-reader
This character has overcome their deafness by learning how to read lips.
column3: Ce personnage a surmonté sa surdité, et a appris à lire sur les lèvres.

column2: Creative
This character is more imaginative than most, able to concoct innovative solutions and come up with exceptional, unexpected ideas.
column3: Ce personnage est plus créatif que la moyenne, et a surement des idées inattendues.

column2: Calm Voice
This character's voice is naturally soothing. While it is neither powerful nor melodious, its mildness can calm even the angriest of people, and slyly persuade even the most skeptical of men.
column3: Ce personnage a une voix douce. Il arrive à calmer même les plus agressifs interlocuteurs, et peut sournoisement persuader le plus sceptique.

column2: Imposing
Whether because of their physical stature or just their typical complexion, this character has a striking posture and a commanding presence. To some, they are even terrifying at times.
column3: Ce personnage a une posture imposante, et une présence digne d'un commandant. Il peut paraitre effrayant à ses ennemis.

column2: Fertile
This character is unusually fertile, and seems to be made for producing healthy heirs.
column3: Ce personnage est incroyablement fertile, et donnera certainement naissance à de nombreux héritiers.

column2: Fashionable
This character prefers to pay attention to the latest fasions and trends, lending them some notoriety in court.
Authoritative
This character rules with an iron fist.  Their aura of authority is unquestionable to those in their presence.
Rude
This character cares nothing for decorum and will speak what is on their mind.
Stubborn
This character cannot be easily persuaded.  Stubbornness is often an asset, but can just as easily frustrate potential allies.
Honorable
This character is known to be bound by honor.
Selfish
This character cares little for the needs of others.
Exhausted
Sad
Dead
This character is dead.
In the East
This character is on a mission in the unknown lands, far to the east of the Blue Mountains.
The Love of Amroth and Nimrodel
Amroth and Nimrodel are in love, but the Sylvan Elf refuses to marry the King of Lorien, as he can't promise her a life of peace.
column3: Amroth et Nimrodel s'aiment, mais l'elfe sylvain refuse d'épouser le Roi de la Lorien, tant que celui-ci ne peut lui promettre une vie de paix.

column2: The Journey of Amroth and Nimrodel
Amroth and Nimrodel have left Lorien, and opened a path that will lead to their loss, or to their happiness.
column3: Amroth et Nimrodel ont quittés la Lorien, et entamés un chemin qui les mènera à leurs pertes, ou à leur bonheur.

column2: Spirit Form
This character lost his material form after the One Ring was cut from his finger at the Battle of the Last Alliance. If he regains this ring, he will be able to return to his full strength.
column3: Ce personnage a perdu sa forme corporelle lorsque l'Anneau Unique a été coupé de sa main, durant la Bataille de la Dernière Alliance. S'il retrouve l'Anneau, il sera alors capable de retrouver sa pleine puissance, et sa forme perdue.

column2: Torturer
This character has perfected torture to a craft, and applies it well to extract information needed or simply to gratify fiendish impulses.
This character enjoys fine food and drink, perhaps a bit too much.
This character is known for their carnal adventures and flirtatious demeanour.
This character is discontent with their current state in life, and seeks the higher positions and possessions of others.
This character's anger is an unstoppable force when evoked.  This can lead to unfortunate outbursts and violent episodes.
This character is arrogant and overly self-confident.  Such clear hubris can be unlikeable.
This character always seeks greater power and riches, and is loathe to relinquish either once gained.  Greed can lead to success, but it also makes few friends.
This character is simply lazy and prefers to send others to do their work for them.
This character is not only merciless to their foes, but spreads fear by subjecting victims to unspeakable torture.  Their conquests are marked by the mutilated corpses of innocents.
Mystic
This character has tapped into the many mysterious powers of the universe.  They know much of the world and are a dangerous foe to face.
